Attacks.Name: Quick Attack
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is pushed away short range.

Attacks.Name: Ice Beam
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is given the Slow special condition.

Attacks.Name: Blizzard
Attacks.Effect: This attack targets all characters within its area of effect. Characters damaged by this attack gain the Slow special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Ice Body
Superpowers.Effect: At the start of Glaceon's activation, it heals 1 damage.

Superpowers.Name: Mirror Coat
Superpowers.Effect: The next time Glaceon is damaged by an enemy attack this round, the attacking character suffers damage equal to the amount of damage dealt to Glaceon.

Attacks.Name: Frost Breath
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, count as Critical
